      • remote

        public boolean remote​(int port,
                      int id,
                      java.lang.String address)
        Executes a local update and send package to remote server. It will wait for remote ACK package using ackSocket socket In case package is received, return true. Return false otherwise
        Parameters:
        port -
        id -
        Returns:
        boolean

      • decreaseEvent

        public boolean decreaseEvent()
        If there is available events, decrease it and return true. Return false otherwise
